column2: PAPA BEAR. THIS IS BRAVO BLACK ONE. HOSPITAL IS SECURED I REPEAT HOSPITAL IS SECURED. SEND IN THE CAVALRY. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK ONE. THIS IS PAPA BEAR. ROGER THAT, SUPPORT FORCES ARE ON THEIR WAY. STAND BY. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK ONE. THIS IS PAPA BEAR. LOOKS LIKE ALL RUSSIANS ARE WIPED OUT. GOOD JOB. MISSION COMPLETE. OVER.
